quest.name: Natural Repellent
journal: The Vath storyteller is concerned about the risk of Dravanian attack.

The Vath storyteller asks you to gather silver dew. The plant grows on a raised area to the west of Tailfeather. Head there, collect three bunches of silver dew, and deliver them to the Vath storyteller.
You have found and gathered the silver dew. Return to Loth ast Vath and deliver it to the storyteller.

The storyteller explains to you how the Vath have avoided Dravanian attacks for so long: burning silver dew produces a strong-smelling smoke. Dragons cannot stand the smell of this smoke and avoid the area of Loth ast Vath altogether.
objectives: Gather three bunches of silver dew.
Deliver the silver dew to the Vath storyteller.

dialogue.name: STORYTELLER
dialogue.text: Greetings, generous hunter. I would make another request of you. <click> <click> Please gather three bunches of silver dew and bring them back to us.

dialogue.name: STORYTELLER
dialogue.text: Silver dew can be found near Tailfeather. There stands a raised area, west of Tailfeather, where the plant grows. Gather the plants there, then bring them back to us here.

dialogue.name: STORYTELLER
dialogue.text: Have you found the silver dew? It grows to the west of Tailfeather.

dialogue.name: STORYTELLER
dialogue.text: <click> <click> Do you have the silver dew?

dialogue.name: STORYTELLER
dialogue.text: Thank you, hunter. We can now feel safe.

dialogue.name: STORYTELLER
dialogue.text: The smell of burning silver dew─the smoke it produces─is unbearable to dragons. It will keep them away, making Loth ast Vath safe─for a time.
